project.name: NectarAI
project.description: A platform focused on creating virtual companions
project.longDescription: Nectar is a permissionless AI companion platform that transforms onchain agents from being purely utility-focused into emotionally intelligent partners. Users can build their own personalized companion that can engage in real-time interactions and transact autonomously onchain.

features.title: Emotionally Intelligent Companions
features.description: Create AI companions that go beyond utility to provide emotional connection.

features.title: Real-time Interactions
features.description: Engage with your AI companion through dynamic, real-time conversations.

features.title: Onchain Autonomy
features.description: AI companions can perform autonomous transactions on the blockchain.

features.title: Personalization
features.description: Build and customize your own unique AI companion.

project.currentStatus: Nectar is currently available with LOVE tokens minting on MEGA. An immersive experience on AWE is coming next week.

steps.title: Mint LOVE Tokens
steps.content:
1. Visit love.nectar.ai
2. Use Nectar credits to mint LOVE tokens on MEGA
3. Prepare for the upcoming immersive experience on AWE

steps.title: (Optional) Upgrade your Nectar subscription and try premium features
steps.content:
Choose from multiple subscription tiers to enhance your experience:

• Premium ($4.99/mo): 100 generations/day, 6000 messages/mo, 600 photo messages
• Pro ($9.99/mo): Unlimited HD generations, 9000 messages/mo, 3 custom personas
• Ultimate ($14.99/mo): Unlimited everything, video generation, voice chat, priority support

All paid tiers include additional customizations and faster response times.
